entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 22 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:37 PM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:37 PM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:37 PM EST Thursday 22 December 2022
